resources.string: About Techstars Startup Weekend: Techstars Startup Weekends are 54-hours events designed to provide superior experimential education for technical and non-technical enterpreneurs. Beginning with Firday night pitches and continuing through brainstroming, budiness plan developpment and basic prototyping creation. Techstars Startup Weekends culminate in sunday night demos and presentations. Participants create working startup during the events and collaborate with likeminded individuals outside of their daily networks. All teams hear talks by industry leaders and recives valuable feedbacks from local enterpreneuers. The weekends is centered around action, inovation, and education. Weather you are looking for feedback on idea, a co-founder, specific skills sets, or team to help you execute. Techstars Startup Weekends are the perfect enviroment in which to test your idea and take the first steeps towards launching your own ideas.
